name: Avatar
description: Avatar component for displaying user profile images

props.name: animate
props.description: Adds fade in animation when Avatar image loads. This prop isn't supported on web (will be set to false by default when using web).

props.name: backgroundColor
props.description: Background color for Avatar

props.name: badgePosition
props.description: Badge location on Avatar

props.name: badgeProps
props.description: Badge props passed down to Badge component

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: Additional spacing styles for the container

props.name: source
props.description: The image source (external or from assets)

props.name: imageProps
props.description: Image props object

props.name: imageStyle
props.description: Image style object used to pass additional style props by components which render image

props.name: onImageLoadStart
props.description: Listener-callback for when an image's (uri) loading starts (equiv. to Image.onLoadStart()).

props.name: onImageLoadEnd
props.description: Listener-callback for when an image's (uri) loading either succeeds or fails (equiv. to Image.onLoadEnd()).

props.name: onImageLoadError
props.description: Listener-callback for when an image's (uri) loading fails (equiv. to Image.onError()).

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the avatar user. If no label is provided, the initials will be generated from the name. autoColorsConfig will use the name to create the background color of the Avatar.

props.name: useAutoColors
props.description: Hash the name (or label) to get a color, so each name will have a specific color. Default is false.

props.name: autoColorsConfig
props.description: Send this to use the name to infer a backgroundColor

props.name: label
props.description: Label that can represent initials

props.name: labelColor
props.description: The label color

props.name: ribbonLabel
props.description: Ribbon label to display on the avatar

props.name: ribbonStyle
props.description: Ribbon custom style

props.name: ribbonLabelStyle
props.description: Ribbon label custom style

props.name: customRibbon
props.description: Custom ribbon

props.name: size
props.description: Custom size for the Avatar

props.name: onPress
props.description: Press handler

props.name: testID
props.description: Test identifier

hero.title: Avatar
hero.description: An Avatar component is a visual representation of a user or entity, often displayed as a circular image, icon, or placeholder with initials. In mobile app design systems, it is used to personalize the interface by representing users in profiles, chats, notifications, or lists. Avatars help users quickly recognize people, accounts, or items, enhancing both engagement and navigational clarity.

items.title: Label
items.description: Supported only in XLarge, Large and Medium.
